name: express_crud
description: 1. Create Folder Structure     1. create root folder as VJS E-commerce     2. add public      3. create src folder in frontend     4. create index.html with heading VJS E-commerce in src     5. run npm init in frontend folder      6. npm install live-sercer      7. add start command as live-server src --verbose --     8. run npm start
